function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Advanced hardware and infrastructure for real-time processing, regular system maintenance and updates, and redundancy in case of system campaigns","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of data-driven monitoring systems, improved testing and tracking","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of protective gear, remote work arrangements, staggered work hours","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Precautionary measures, social distancing, isolation, and quarantine","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated research for communication","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gather feedback, address concerns, and offer flexible work arrangements","category":"Support
